attributes.action: Demand an immediate general election due to the appointment of Gordon Brown as Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the last General Election I voted for Tony Blair to be Prime Minister, and not James Gordon Brown. Any change to the outcome of that vote should be decided in accordance with our National Constitition by the Electorate of the Country as a whole, and not due to internal Labour party politics or rivalry.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/post-manifesto/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
